For further improvement of the comparison between species, we repeated the process for full model fitting with the selected climatic variables from models 1 and 2 above, this time using scaled growth data as an independent variable, to lessen differences in age and in species growth potential. We applied the following formula for each subset of data (for each age nested within each species):
